  • Insightful Sneak Attack Bonus +5Insightful Sneak Attack Bonus +5: Provides a +5 Insight modifier to your attack bonus and a +8 Insight bonus to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
  • Heightened Awareness (5)Heightened Awareness (5): This item helps you to quickly read situations with sharpness and clarity, allowing you to predict actions before they occur. You gain a +5 Insight bonus to AC.

When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
